headline: Morgan Stanley Downgrades Fortinet, Inc. (FTNT) from Equal Weight to Underweight, Reduces Its Price Target to $67
summary: With significant upside potential, Fortinet, Inc. (NASDAQ:FTNT) secures a spot on our list of the 13 Best Quality Stocks to Buy According to Hedge Funds. On September 2, Fortinet, Inc. (NASDAQ:FTNT) was downgraded from Equal Weight to Underweight by Morgan Stanley, which also reduced its price target from $78 to $67 due to worries that […]
